p: Regarding clinical features, COVID-19 seems similar to SARS; however, it is considered to be less lethal than MERS, which differs from the other two CoV in terms of both phylogenetic and pathogenetic features. Due to the less severe clinical picture, COVID-19 can spread in the community more easily than MERS and SARS, which is reported in the nosocomial settings[ 13- 15].
